column4: will apt-get distro upgrade or whatever hte command is do a good safe job?
on Mandriva i've always did a full format and reinstall, with the exception of my /home partition, but obviously that's not an ideal way for a prod environment

the recommendation for those questions is always stay on the LTS, unless there is something you need in a non-lts release. You can ask for more in #ubuntu-server and the best way to upgrade on the server is running sudo do-release-upgrade
